t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Amazon
s: If you do not have official brand registration, is it impossible to put your brand name in the field for your product listing? If so, I understand you need to put “N/A”. However, this appears in your product title. I don’t understand how anybody would ever want this on their title…

t: Can anybody help - Amazon adding "generic" to titles
s: We’re not brand registered yet and currently sell on Amazon Custom, in the last week Amazon have started adding ‘generic’ to the start of listing titles and the model number to end. Does anybody have any idea this is happening?

t: Amazon
s: does it apply to all product and categories? Or only some products? I want to ensure that the listings I create are owned only by my account. Or else i will have to create a generic brand custom for my company (which as can see above the "Sell this product" button is freely available to anybody).
